pci_projects_project_users_download-open: You are about to download a configuration file that can be used to connect to OpenStack.
Select the region for this file:

Some services, such as Object Storage and Cloud Archive, for example, are located in regions described as ‘global’ (e.g. GRA). Most other services are located in specific regions (e.g. GRA5).
